snippet.title: Wurm Online - Factional Fight Trailer
snippet.description:
This Trailer for Wurm Online was made by the Factional Fight brothers, aimed at showcasing just what is possible in Wurm. It's a little outdated in graphics but remains an idea of just what is possible in this game. 

What is Wurm Online?

Wurm Online is a true sandbox MMORPG. With completely modifiable land, huge in depth player crafting and multiple lands to sail between and both PvP and PvE experiences. Wurm Online offers a true sandbox experience where you can truly shape the land.

Website: https://wurmonline.com
Facebook: https://facebook.com/wurmonlineofficial
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wurmonline
Twitch: https://twitch.tv/wurmonlineofficial
Forums: https://forum.wurmonline.com
Discord: https:/discord.gg/wurm
